QuestData.Title: Burning Beauty
QuestData.Description: Before you go, there is someone you should meet.$b$bShe might set some of your stuff on fire, but I believe she's the best mage this side of Draenor.$b$bShe belongs on the front lines with you, commander.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Vivianne at Warspear in Ashran.
QuestData.RewardText: So, you are the commander? Sylvanas sent me to find you.
